name: K-Tar - A Musical Odyssey
description:
Welcome to K-Tar.

The best Keytarrist in the world has been thrown in the musical dungeon.

He must collect and use the Magical Keys to be able to unlock his DESTINY!

But beware, every key you hold weights you down. The price for being greedy is your mobility.

------ This is the first step of this game. ------
Many systems still need to be fixed and implemented, we will look into it in the following weeks.

Credits:

Diego Sá

Eduardo Pras

Gustavo Encinas
